value:
$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|I'll wish that...the taguel are safe from
extinction, and... Hm.$k$pOh, and that my relationship with my
mother can be more like a typical
bond between parent and child...$k$pAnd while we're at it, that she'll be
kinder to me in general... And also
that she'll—$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|What is it you're mumbling about
over there, Yarne?$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|Ah! M-Mother! It's just you...$k$pI was just thinking about what I
should ask for at the shrine.$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|I heard you saying "mother"
something or other...$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|Oh, I was just thinking I would...
ask that you be kept healthy and
strong this coming year!$k$p$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|...Is that so?$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_年明ベルベット,ch04_32_Velvet_F_NewYear23,Face|I am blessed to have such a kind
and thoughtful son.$k$pNow, let's hurry on to the shrine
before you forget that wish of yours.$k$p$WmMPID_年明シャンブレー,ch04_37_Chanbray_M_NewYear23,Face|O-of course.$k$p$Sbs150|
